org.flixel.FlxSave

type
class
A class to help automate and simplify save game functionality. Basicaly a wrapper for the Flash SharedObject thing, but handles some annoying storage request stuff too.

Static Variables

private ERROR : Int

private PENDING : Int

private SUCCESS : Int

Constructor

public new()
Blanks out the containers.

Instance Variables

private _closeRequested : Bool

Internal tracker for save object close request.

private _onComplete : Bool -> Void

Internal tracker for callback function in case save takes too long.

private _sharedObject : nme.net.SharedObject

The local shared object itself.

public data : Dynamic

Allows you to directly access the data container in the local shared object.

public name : String

The name of the local shared object.

Instance Methods

public bind(Name : String) : Bool

Automatically creates or reconnects to locally saved data.
Parameters:
Name - The name of the object (should be the same each time to access old data).
Returns:
Whether or not you successfully connected to the save data.

private checkBinding() : Bool

Handy utility function for checking and warning if the shared object is bound yet or not.
Returns:
Whether the shared object was bound yet.

public close(?MinFileSize : Int, ?OnComplete : Bool -> Void) : Bool

A way to safely call flush() and destroy() on your save file. Will correctly handle storage size popups and all that good stuff. If you don't want to save your changes first, just call destroy() instead.
Parameters:
MinFileSize - If you need X amount of space for your save, specify it here.
OnComplete - This callback will be triggered when the data is written successfully.
Returns:
The result of result of the flush() call (see below for more details).

public destroy() : Void

Clean up memory.

public erase() : Bool

Erases everything stored in the local shared object. Data is immediately erased and the object is saved that way, so use with caution!
Returns:
Returns false if the save object is not bound yet.

public flush(?MinFileSize : Int, ?OnComplete : Bool -> Void) : Bool

Writes the local shared object to disk immediately. Leaves the object open in memory.
Parameters:
MinFileSize - If you need X amount of space for your save, specify it here.
OnComplete - This callback will be triggered when the data is written successfully.
Returns:
Whether or not the data was written immediately. False could be an error OR a storage request popup.

private onDone(Result : Int) : Bool

Event handler for special case storage requests. Handles logging of errors and calling of callback.
Parameters:
Result - One of the result codes (PENDING, ERROR, or SUCCESS).
Returns:
Whether the operation was a success or not.

private onFlushStatus(E : flash.events.NetStatusEvent) : Void

Event handler for special case storage requests.
Parameters:
E - Flash net status event.
